ai-atk-s0510a30:1_0: the Elder’s son was allowed to put into the Uppalavaṇṇā
ai-atk-s0510a30:2_0: Thirty-two eons of the Thirty-Three are very pure, empty,
ai-atk-s0510a30:3_1: Compared with the four great flowers of offerings, watered by rims of flowers, burning with the head of flowers and fruits, bringing them to the flowers.
ai-atk-s0510a30:4_0: The five months have adhered to.
ai-atk-s0510a30:5_1: the sixth offering, the name of the Shrine, the highest among men, the supremely Shrine, the ruler of the world, your own relationship to the Fortunate One, and your kinsmen, –
ai-atk-s0510a30:5_2: in the jungle thicket of the people in the forest, jackals of Kusinārā, best of towns, inhabited by people, –
ai-atk-s0510a30:5_3: I think there was a blind man’s level in the Dark Forest, which I was blind. I seek the road in the Dark Forest, I do not seek the way that.
ai-atk-s0510a30:5_4: But thinking that the rain fall from the earlier starting way, I left the seat of the Buddha. When I saw a lion’s roar, the meaning is the best seat, or the best seat.
ai-atk-s0510a30:5_5: Arranging his robe over one shoulder, raising his clasped hands, and raised his joined palms toward him:
ai-atk-s0510a30:5_6: Standing there, they attain the end of the world, and in the world, they call him into the presence of quenching.
ai-atk-s0510a30:6_1: The Buddha is the thirty-two marks of a great man. And he is going on seeing the thirty-two marks of a great man with his own hands, shakes, and rocks and trembles.
ai-atk-s0510a30:6_2: He lives in dependence on the best house.
ai-atk-s0510a30:7_0: Eight lost oppression of the eight thought-eight given.
ai-atk-s0510a30:8_0: He was thirty-two signs of Bāhiya
